short_summary: Renewal of Freight Forwarding Transportation Source Lists
description: This Invitation to Qualify will establish two separate Source Lists to cater to DND\u2019s freight forwarding requirements - (i) Freight Forwarding (Simple) Services and (ii) Freight Forwarding (Complex) Services. The successful service providers and brokers will be notified in writing once they have been included in the appropriate Source List.
full_summary:
**Department of National Defence Tender Invitation - Freight Forwarding Services**

**Notice Reference:** cb-638-51031295

**Publication Date:** November 6, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 18, 2025

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites industry to submit applications for Qualification to provide Freight Forwarding Services.

The DND uses multiple transportation modes to move materiel domestically and internationally to support operations and exercises. To meet these requirements, the DND maintains lists of pre-qualified service providers and brokers.

**Renewal of Freight Forwarding Source Lists**

The 2020 Freight Forwarding Source Lists expire on November 18, 2022. The DND is soliciting industry applications to renew the Freight Forwarding Source Lists. Two separate applications are required, one for Freight Forwarding (Simple) Services and one for Freight Forwarding (Complex) Services.

**Description of Services**

Freight Forwarding (Simple) Services: This involves the domestic or international movement of a small number of sea containers, vehicles, trailers, and/or equipment. These movements are routine in nature and can be satisfied through existing shipping routes.

Freight Forwarding (Complex) Services: This involves the domestic or international movement of a large number of sea containers, vehicles, trailers, and/or oversized or non-containerized equipment. These movements are not routine in nature and may require part of or an entire vessel.

**Validity Period**

The renewed Freight Forwarding Source Lists will remain valid for two years, beginning November 19, 2022.

**Application Process**

To be included in the Freight Forwarding Source Lists, applicants must address all qualifying criteria in the Application Forms provided. Applications submitted by November 10, 2022, will be reviewed immediately and successful applicants included in the Freight Forwarding Source Lists. Applications submitted after November 10, 2022, will be reviewed by the DND as time and resources permit.

**Contact Information**

For further information or to submit an application, please contact Derek Shields:

Email: [TransportationContracting@forces.gc.ca](mailto:TransportationContracting@forces.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 993-6857

Attachments:

* Annex A - Freight Forwarding (Simple) Services Application
* Annex B - Freight Forwarding (Complex) Services Application

**Important Notes**

* The DND may conduct a credit check and/or security check on the company and its principals.
* Transportation services are exempt from the provisions of various
